issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: I am new to Titanium Studio. I downloaded Xcode from apple and it indicated that the iOS SDK is included in that download. However, Titanium Studio is not recognizing it. It shows that the iOS SDK is not installed. When I click on install, the XCode screen on my new MacBookAir comes up and indicates it is installed. Can someone help me as to what I am doing wrong. Do I have to download something else? I am running Lion OS X 10.8.3. Thank you

comments.body:
This issue is resolved. Thanks
ARvind
